divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside of my home smokeing a cigarette at 8:03 pm when I noticed a triangle shaped object flying from west to southwest at a high rate of speed with diffrent lights flashing and was sure it was not a airplane becouse of the way it was flying.I screamed for my girl friend to come outside and she saw the object dissapear.I then calle my friend Don at 8:06pm becouse he was out on the ice fishing for smelt but he was inside of his shanty.I never have seen anything in the sky and I was a skeptic until that night.I didnt report the object but told several people about the object and thenon tue march 9th a half mile from where I live a family had seen the same object and reported it.that is why i am letting you know what they saw was real and I will confirm the sighting.That night it was so clear that the stars a very rarely that bright,one of those rare nights that you can see every star and i was only takeing in the beuty of the night not looking for a ufo.Manistee Lakeshore resident
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Manistee
There were no other sightings in Manistee on or around March 3rd 2010
Summary: triangle diffrent lights eractic flying then dissapered
